BecomeAseller.Header: Everything you need to start selling online!
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentSubHeader: Selling online has never been easier.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow1Content: Get straight to growing your business. We handle everything to sell online. So you can focus on your business rather managing the infrastructure.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow2Content: Get a holistic and detailed view of your business to better understand sales, orders, and customers to better tailor your products.
BecomeAseller.Tab1ContentRow3Content: We don't keep your money! The payment goes to you directly as soon as a buyer pays.
BecomeAseller.Tab2ContentSubHeader: It's Good To Know How The System Works, Before You Register.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem1Content: After you list your offers, customers can visit them on the Marketplace. We'll notify you when customers place an order. Fulfill the order on promised time is very important.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem2Content: Listing your products is really simple through our easy to use the self-serve portal. Upload including high-quality product images and additional details.
BecomeAseller.Tab2ContentRow3Content: We don't keep your money! The payment goes to you directly as soon as a buyer pays.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem3Content: After you list your offers, customers can visit them on the Marketplace. We'll notify you when customers place an order. Fulfill the order on promised time is very important.
BecomeAseller.Tab2Contentlistitem4Content: We don't hold your money, the payment will be sent to your connected account directly.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian1Header: WHY SHOULD I SELL ON ShopsWallet?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian1Body: There are many reasons to sell on ShopsWallet. We have our customers who can see your products to the ability to start selling fast without the need to create a new standalone website. You spend no time and money to do marekting, We do it for you!
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian2Header: WHERE ELSE CAN I LEARN ABOUT HOW SELLING ON ShopsWallet WORKS?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian2Body: We have videos, web docs, and blogs to help you find what you need.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian3Body: If you want to close your account permanently, Seller Support can assist you. Keep in mind that you can use the Maintenance mode feature that will hide all your listings, or you can deactivate or remove your listings entirely but hold on to your account for future use. Before you close your account permanently, please cancel and remove your listings and resolve all transactions.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian4Header: HOW DO I MANAGE MY MERCHANT ACCOUNT?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian4Body: Use will get access to a full featured Merchant Dashboard to manage all aspects of selling on ShopsWallet, like manage your selling account, add product information, make inventory updates, manage orders, and manage users.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian5Header: HOW MANY ITEMS I CAN ADD ON MY INVENTORY?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian5Body: It depends on which sbscription you choose. Please visit the pricing section for detail.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian6Header: HOW WILL I KNOW WHEN I HAVE A SALE?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian6Body: ShopsWallet notifies you by email when you receive an order. You can change the notification settings in your account settings.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian7Header: CAN I OFFER GIFT-WRAP AND PACKAGING SERVICES TO MY CUSTOMERS?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian7Body: Yes. Our packaging service allows customers to choose when they check out, you can make the options available for any individual item on your listing page.
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian8Header: HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO SELL ON ShopsWallet?
BecomeAseller.FaqAccordian8Body: ShopsWallet offers different selling plans for a monthly subscription fee plus per-item selling fees, which vary by subscriptions. Please visit the pricing section for detail.
